casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Nathan SHAW. No. 326P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. Douglas Corkhill, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed by Andrew G. Schopler on the 2nd day of August 2004 by to Withdraw as Appointed Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of August 2004."
